channel.title: July on CodeWithStu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in July on CodeWithStu's Blog

item.title: Architecture Pathway Introduction
item.description: Over the past year or so, I’ve had the pleasure of mentoring people on their software development journeys. Some of those personnel have expressed a desire to pursue the software architect route. As it’s something that I often refer to, I’ve decided to post a mini-pathway to help guide on some of the basics.

item.title: My Favourite Git Aliases
item.description: Git aliases are used to create new git commands that can either invoke a function, or be used to create commands that map to longer commands. For example, we could map git co to git checkout or have git undo undo our previous commit. In this article, I’m going to show you some of my favourite git aliases.
